content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Everything you need to know about accessing library resources and services before, and during, the break. There will be changes to opening hours from the end of autumn term. Please check the individual library pages for opening times before your visit. Whilst our libraries are closed, you can still access our online resources, including ebooks, ejournals, academic skills resources, help guides and more. Our library staff are here to make sure you have access to the resources you need. Contact us by email, phone or live chat and we'll help you get ready for the break. Our handy guide to preparing for the break Contact us if you're not sure where to get started. Do you have questions about your library account or visiting the library? Take a look at our Libraries events calendar for online sessions to support your studies and research. King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
